description: A woman weeps inconsolably while two men resembling detectives survey a room. Their focus is on a potted plant hanging by a rope tied into a noose, with a fallen stool nearby, suggesting a deliberate act. This surreal situation portrays human grief and official investigation in response to a plant's apparent suicide, highlighting the absurdity of anthropomorphizing vegetation. The scene ironically mirrors a typical human tragedy investigation.
caption: "I can't believe it! ... I was just talking to him yesterday!"
